message_text:
5. Listen and talk to each other

Listening and talking to those around us is key to a more peaceful home. Talking to your partner about issues before they become problems can help avoid arguments from building up.
Would you like to see a comic about listening and talking to each other?

Parent 1: “Are you okay, my love? You look tired.”

Parent 2: “I didn’t sleep well last night and so I am feeling quite tired.”

(1)

Parent 1: “I am sorry to hear that, Amir. Is there anything I can do to help?”

Parent 2: “I might try and get an earlier rest this evening.”

(2)

Parent 1: “I can take over the children’s bedtime routine after dinner tonight, so that you can get some extra rest.”

(3)

Parent 2: “That would be lovely. Thank you so much, my dear.”

(4)
Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
